name: mote (Kiana Mosser, mattfisher)
description:
you are small and transient, like a mote of dust drifting through rays of light in the morning sky.

and yet, you exist in this ethereal world.

controls

move

  • WASD or Arrow Keys (keyboard)
  • Left Joystick (controller)

dash

  • Space Bar or E (keyboard)
  • A Button (controller)

speak

  • Ctrl or Q (keyboard)
  • B Button (controller)
credits
